body.name: LIAN LI ALC360 AIO Cooler 360mm Radiator Liquid CPU Cooler RGB All-in-One Water Cooling System, 3x120mm PWM Fans, LGA1700 Bracket, AMD AM5/AM4 Intel LGA1200/115X Compatible (Black)
features: 360mm Liquid CPU Cooler, A collaboration between LIAN LI and Asetek. Less resistance, better cooling, high cost and performance ratio entry level water-cooled cooler. Less for more, enjoy the synergy of performance and Asetek quality. 5-year warranty for your worry-free liquid-cooling experience

Water Cooling System with Performance Pump. The powerful Asetek pump has low speed-noise ratio, it circulates coolant efficiently and quietly. Easily removable cap designed by LIAN LI fits all different orientations. Thermal paste is pre-applied

Quite and Cool All-In-One AIO Cooler. The low noise water block, durable tube and high-density fin aluminum radiator allow a maximum amount of liquid and heat transfer. Coolant designed to prevent freezing and tube damage even at -20 degrees Celsius

RGB Liquid CPU Cooler. 3x120mm ARGB PWM fans help with heat dissipation and cool air to the radiator. ARGB cap with fancy lighting effects synchronized with fans delivering astonishing lighting. Compatible with most mainstream motherboard softwares to sync wth the system

Hassle-Free Installation, Universal Compatibility. This CPU cooler is easy to instal, the new retention facilitates easy integration on both AMD and Intel platform, supports latest Intel/AMD CPU motherboard sockets including Intel LGA 1700, 1200, 115X, and AMD AM5, AM4

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LIAN LI ALC360 Closed Loop All-in-one CPU Cooler Here we have the ALC360 360mm radiator AIO - A collaboration between LIAN LI and Asetek. It has less resistance, better cooling, high cost and performance ratio entry-level water-cooled cooler. Less for more, enjoy the synergy of performance and Asetek quality, providing you with a great liquid-cooling experience. Shape your style, and unleash your PC performance, supporting Intel LGA 1700 and AMD AMD5 socket.

Performance Pump The powerful Asetek pump has low speed-noise ratio, it circulates coolant efficiently and quietly. ARGB cap with fancy lighting effects synchronized with fans delivering astonishing lighting. Thermal paste is pre-applied for your easy use. High-density 360mm Radiator The 360mm radiator has durable aluminium shields, 20 FPI single-stacked radiator fins, and 12 rows of water pathways. They help with an increased heat dissipation area and allow a large amount of liquid to pass through and transfer the heat out of the system efficiently. Reinforced Braided Tube The reinforced braided tube is rasier to bend, strongly built, and durable, making installation a breeze. Massive Airflow 120mm Fans Large airflow ARGB radiator fans that support quick -link daisy chains cable connections.

ALC360 AIO Specifications Compatible Intel Sockets LGA 115x/1200/1700 Compatible AMD Sockets AM4, AM5 Water Pump Speed 2300 RPM +/- 300 RPM Radiator Size 360mm: 120 x 360 x 27mm LED Color ARGB Fan Size 120 x 123 x 25mm Fan Bearing FDB Bearings Fan Speed 300-2450 RPM Fan Airflow 79.9 CFM Fan Noise 30 dBA Fan Max. Air Pressure 3.26 mm-H2O Fan Power Connector 4-pin Power Connector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup, low temps.
reviews.reviewText: Installed this on my and CPU and could not be happier. Installation went quick as long as you don't drop the backplate. All hardware was included and directions were short and to the point.The lian li fans are great. All fans come installed and daisy chained. There is only one cable. Albeit proprietary but with the included splitter the rgb and fan power gets transferred on individual pin sets. This splitter has standard ends and can be hooked to any mobo or other cables. I do like this implementation of the daisy chained fans. Compatible with anything and everything.Highly recommend this to anyone with the space for a 360 aio. I clearly don't and have all ready ordered a new case.
